title: Elegant Diamond Vaale - A Touch of Tradition
materials: G Color). Features Hyderabadi Polish for a lasting shine.
features: Openwork design with a repeating motif of stylized floral and teardrop shapes. Each element is delicately embellished with clusters of brilliant-cut diamonds, securely set in a prong setting. The Vaale showcases a modern aesthetic while retaining a touch of traditional South Indian bangle design.
colors: Warm golden hue from the 22K gold
contrasted by the sparkling white of the diamonds.
occasions: or as an elegant everyday statement piece. This Vaale adds a touch of class to both traditional and modern attire.
description: This Diamond Vaale is a blend of traditional craftsmanship and contemporary design. The high-quality 22K gold and brilliant-cut diamonds ensure lasting value and brilliance. Its unique design and Hyderabadi polish make it a standout piece, perfect for the discerning woman who appreciates timeless elegance.
